item.title: HTML SELECT/Dropdown with JavaScript/jQuery
item.description: A list of commonly needed operations on HTML SELECT/Dropdown using JavaScript/jQuery. Let me know if you find it useful or if you have additions/suggestions to improve the list. JavaScript // get the element var dd = document.getElementById("dropdown"); // Get the total number of options dd.length; // Get the index of selected option dd.selectedIndex; // get the value of selected option dd.options[dd.selectedIndex].value; // Get the selected option/text dd.options[dd.selectedIndex].text; // Reset the dropdoown option; select first option dd.
